title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Workshop to Address Learning Needs of Irish SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: PBL-based curriculum in a smartphone-centric VR simulation environment, solving real-world problems for SMEs.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more science-related problems occurring in SME environments using Problem-Based Learning (PBL)
Learners can apply collaboration and problem-solving strategies in real SME work environments using VR simulations
Learners can visually represent and share PBL project outcomes using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
